items.title: Administrative Assistant
items.organization: University of Arizona - College of Applied Science & Technology
items.description: Answers phone calls and directs callers to the appropriate extensions. Assist walk-ins with whatever information they may need. Handles mail and packages.

items.title: Administrative Student Worker
items.organization: University of Arizona - College of Applied Science & Technology
items.description: Answered calls, managed walk-ins, maintained SharePoint pages, and developed PowerApps applications.

items.title: Research Assistant - VR Lab
items.organization: University of Arizona - College of Applied Science & Technology
items.description: Supported VR research, assisted participants, collected observations, and maintained VR equipment.

items.title: Bachelor of Applied Science, Computer Science
items.organization: University of Arizona - College of Applied Science & Technology
items.description: Focused on software development, game design, and AI. Involved in VR research and campus tech initiatives.

items.title: Associates of Applied Science, Computer Programming
items.description: Foundation coursework in computer science, mathematics, and critical thinking.
